definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: What happens in disputes between direct buyer and seller?
sentences.chinese: 直接購買者與出售者之間發生哪些爭端？

sentences.english: Fairtrade gives the buyers the satisfaction of helping those who need it most.
sentences.chinese: 而公平貿易能讓購買者獲得幫助最需要的人的滿足感。

sentences.english: But early adopter buyers, analysts say, tend to be picky consumers.
sentences.chinese: 但是早期的購買者傾向於是吹毛求疵的消費者。

sentences.english: On one hand purchaser cannot all-around understanding goods news.
sentences.chinese: 一方面購買者不能全方位瞭解商品信息。

sentences.english: The purchaser must ultimately ensure that there is a high-quality computer component.
sentences.chinese: 購買者最終一定要確保計算機裏面是高質量的部件。

sentences.english: Slow-loading pages. Prospective buyers won't wait for your pages to load.
sentences.chinese: 網頁下載速度慢，潛在購買者會因此離開網站。

sentences.english: The buyers were left with worthless holes in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 購買者收到的僅僅是地面上一個毫無用途的大坑。

sentences.english: Buyers of protection also have to find sellers—banks, say, or hedge funds.
sentences.chinese: 保險的購買者也必須找到賣家，例如銀行或對沖基金。

sentences.english: Pls leave a message to purchase, Price are discussable.
sentences.chinese: 欲購買者請留言，價錢方面可再商量。

sentences.english: The green reusable bag was meant to discourage shoppers from using plastic.
sentences.chinese: 環保袋的主意是，希望購買者可以不要用塑膠袋。

sentences.english: To risk to option-buyers is limited to the premium theypay.
sentences.chinese: 期權購買者的風險因其支付了期權費而被限定。

sentences.english: The buyer then reviews the information and proceeds with the next ordering process.
sentences.chinese: 之後購買者將瀏覽信息並繼續進行下個定購流程。

sentences.english: The chief function of direct-mail advertising is to familiarize prospective buyers with a product.
sentences.chinese: 直接郵寄廣告的主要目的是讓潛在購買者熟悉產品。

sentences.english: Rich car buyers in China prefer to be driven by chauffeurs.
sentences.chinese: 中國富裕的汽車購買者喜歡配備私人司機。

sentences.english: When used as a wrapper, cellophane lets the purchaser see the contents of the package.
sentences.chinese: 用玻璃紙包裝使購買者能看到包內的物品。

definition: ability to make one's own decisions
public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
